Verses: 1 karththaave, En Jebaththaik Kelum, En Vinnappangalukkuch Sevikodum; Umadhu Unmaiyinpadiyum Umadhu Needhiyinpadiyum Enakku Uththaravu Arulichcheyyum.
2 jeevanulla Oruvanum Umakku Munbaaga Needhimaan Allaadhadhinaale, Adiyenai Niyaayandheerkkap Piravesiyaadheyum.
3 saththuru En Aaththumaavaith Thodarndhu, En Piraananaith Tharaiyode Nasukki, Vegukaalaththukkumun Mariththavargalpol Ennai Irulil Irukkappannugiraan.
4 en Aavi Ennil Thiyangugiradhu; En Irudhayam Enakkul Sorndhupogiradhu.
5 poorvanaatkalai Ninaikkiren, Umadhu Seygaigalaiyellaam Dhiyaanikkiren; Umadhu Karaththin Kiriyaigalai Yosikkiren.
6 en Kaigalai Umakku Neraaga Virikkiren; Varanda Nilaththaippol En Aaththumaa Ummel Thaagamaayirukkiradhu. (selaa.)
7 karththaave, Seekkiramaai Enakkuch Sevikodum, En Aavi Thoindhupogiradhu; Naan Kuzhiyil Irangugiravargalukku Oppaagaadhapadikku, Umadhu Mugaththai Enakku Maraiyaadheyum.
8 adhigaalaiyil Umadhu Kirubaiyaik Ketkappannum, Ummai Nambiyirukkiren, Naan Nadakkavendiya Vazhiyai Enakkuk Kaanbiyum; Ummidaththil En Aaththumaavai Uyarththukiren.
9 karththaave, En Saththurukkalukku Ennaith Thappuviyum; Ummaip Pugalidamaagak Kollugiren.
10 umakkup Piriyamaanadhaich Seyya Enakkup Podhiththarulum, Neere En Dhevan; Ummudaiya Nalla Aavi Ennaich Semmaiyaana Vazhiyile Nadaththuvaaraaga.
11 karththaave, Ummudaiya Naamaththinimiththam Ennai Uyirppiyum; Ummudaiya Needhiyinpadi En Aaththumaavai Idukkaththirku Neengalaakkividum.
12 ummudaiya Kirubaiyinpadi En Saththurukkalai Azhiththu, En Aaththumaavai Odukkukira Yaavaraiyum Sangaarampannum; Naan Umadhu Adiyen.
